comments.content: This was probably a custom logo, but I think I could reproduce this using [Pritchard](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124054/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/pritchard/) for the B & H, and [Plaza](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518124054/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/plaza/) for the M. The � (OE) would have to be custom.
Thank you very much for the quick response!
